attributes.additional_details:
Children are vunerable and you make people be fully qualified to work with them so why would you not do the same for elderly and vunerable. They have worked their arse off to be where the are now sat so deserve the same respect back. 
We treat our new youth with care and digilence so why not treat the people who gave us this right the same?
attributes.background: Working in a vunerable/elderly environment and nursing my grandparents was hard. But working in care home etc and seeing anyone without a care in the world and never worked a day, only to get job centre off their back half heartly care for people in need is wrong

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure what qualifications you'd like carers to be required to have. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
